content: girly girls halter top materials simply soft acrylic worsted i used watermelon i hook yarn needle for weaving ends abbreviations chain = chain single_crochet= single_crochet half_double_crochet = half-double_crochet double_crochet= double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch sizes 2 3 4 5 6 notes this pattern has been made with cotton-ease using only ¾ skein for the size 5 and worsted weight yarn using roughly 2 oz for the size 2 begin chain 16 18 20 22 24 row 1 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook & each chain across chain 2 turn row 2 2hdc in first chain from hook half_double_crochet in each stitch across to last chain 2hdc in last stitch chain 2 turn row 3 half_double_crochet in each stitch across chain 2 turn repeat row 2 & 3 to desired length with last row being row 3 do not finish off the rest of the instructions will be stated as steps instead of row to avoid confusion step 1 chain 56 56 60 60 66 turn slip_stitch across in each chain slip_stitch into bottom row first tie complete work single_crochet along the edge of half_double_crochet row up to row 1 step 2 chain 56 56 60 60 66 turn slip_stitch down each chain slip_stitch into top row second tie complete work single_crochet along top of beginning chain step 3 chain 56 56 60 60 66 turn slip_stitch down each chain slip_stitch into top row third tie complete work single_crochet down edge of half_double_crochet row down to last half_double_crochet row step 4 chain 56 56 60 60 66 turn slip_stitch down each chain slip_stitch into 1st half_double_crochet in bottom row fourth tie complete step 5 in the first half_double_crochet *work 5 double_crochet skip next half_double_crochet single_crochet in next 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * across ending with a slip_stitch in the last half_double_crochet finish off leave long enough tail to weave
